useCase.name: Manage Fault Management Job and Report

mainSequence.step: Buyer/Client sends a POST request to create a Fault Management Job
Fault Management Job enters inProgress state
Fault Management Report is created as a result of Job
Fault Management Report enters inProgress state
Fault Management Report completes data collection
Fault Management Job is marked as completed
Buyer/Client requests the Fault Management Report content
Fault Management Report content is provided to the Buyer/Client
